item.title: 美国联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）格伦伯格将设立办公室解决工作场所行为问题
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation）负责人计划告诉国会，他将成立一个新的、独立的办公室，专门负责职业操守问题，因为一项外部审查发现，在他的领导下，美国银行监管机构的员工受到了全面的虐待。【原文：The head of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation plans to tell Congress he will establish a new, independent office devoted to professional conduct after an external review found comprehensive mistreatment of employees at the U.S. bank regulator under his watch.】

item.title: 美国小型企业担心 TikTok 禁用，因为它刺激了销售额
item.description: Paul Tran 和妻子 Lynda 共同创立的护肤品牌在 TikTok 上走红后，一切都发生了改变。【原文：Everything changed for Paul Tran and his wife Lynda when the skincare brand they co-founded went viral on TikTok.】

item.title: TikTok 创作者提起诉讼，以阻止美国的撤资或禁令法
item.description: 一群 TikTok 的创作者周二表示，他们向美国联邦法院提起诉讼，寻求阻止乔-拜登总统签署的一项法律，该法律将强制剥离 1.7 亿美国人使用的短视频应用程序或禁止其使用。【原文：A group of TikTok creators said Tuesday they filed suit in U.S. federal court seeking to block a law signed by President Joe Biden that would force the divestiture of the short video app used by 170 million Americans or ban it.】

item.title: 美国机构解决对 America Movil 水下电缆系统的调查
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会（FCC）周二表示，已经解决了对连接美国与哥伦比亚和哥斯达黎加的 America Movil 海底电缆系统的两项调查。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission (FCC) said on Tuesday it has resolved two investigations into the America Movil Submarine Cable System that connects the United States to Colombia and Costa Rica.】

item.title: 比亚迪美洲区负责人称年底前确定墨西哥工厂选址
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪的美洲区负责人周二表示，该公司预计将于2024年底在墨西哥选址建厂，年产量将达15万辆。【原文：Chinese electric auto maker BYD expects to have chosen a site to build a plant in Mexico, where it will put out up to 150,000 cars a year, by the end of 2024, the firm's Americas head said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国议员敦促调解委员会帮助空乘人员达成劳资协议
item.description: 周二，160 多名美国众议院议员敦促全国调解委员会（NMB）采取措施，帮助约 8 万名空乘人员达成新的合同协议。【原文：More than 160 U.S. House lawmakers on Tuesday urged the National Mediation Board (NMB) to take steps to help about 80,000 flight attendants reach new contract deals.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，索尼重新考虑对派拉蒙的竞购
item.description: 据 CNBC 周二援引消息人士的话报道，索尼影业公司正在重新考虑对派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）的竞购，导致这家美国媒体公司的股价下跌超过 7%。【原文：Sony Pictures is rethinking its bid for Paramount Global , CNBC reported on Tuesday, citing sources, sending the shares of the U.S. media company down more than 7%.】

item.title: 拜登提高美国对中国进口产品的关税
item.description: 美国总统乔-拜登周二宣布对包括电动汽车（EV）电池、计算机芯片和医疗产品在内的一系列中国进口产品大幅提高关税。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden on Tuesday unveiled steep tariff increases on an array of Chinese imports, including electric vehicle (EV) batteries, computer chips and medical products.】

item.title: 负责实施银行重组的花旗高管离职
item.description: 路透社周二看到的一份内部备忘录显示，花旗集团负责实施全面重组计划的高管蒂尔-科尔（Titi Cole）即将离职。【原文：Citigroup's Titi Cole, a top executive in charge of implementing its sweeping restructuring plan, is leaving the bank, an internal memo seen by Reuters showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 谷歌推出 Trillium 芯片，将人工智能数据中心性能提高五倍
item.description: 谷歌母公司 Alphabet 周二发布了其人工智能数据中心芯片系列中一款名为 Trillium 的产品，并称该产品的速度是上一版本的近五倍。【原文：Google parent Alphabet on Tuesday unveiled a product called Trillium in its artificial intelligence data center chip family that it says is nearly five times as fast as its prior version.】

item.title: Meta 将关闭 Workplace 应用程序，专注于人工智能和元宇宙
item.description: Facebook 母公司 Meta Platforms 周二表示，随着公司将重心转向人工智能和元宇宙技术的开发，该公司将停用以工作为重点的 Workplace 应用程序。【原文：Meta Platforms will discontinue its work-focused Workplace app as the company shifts its focus on building artificial intelligence and metaverse technologies, the Facebook parent said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 野村分析师称，美国银行业倒闭率可能激增近 50
item.description: 野村（Nomura）分析师格雷格-赫特里希（Greg Hertrich）周二在该公司纽约办事处对记者说，在利率上升和经营问题的压力下，未来几年可能有近 50 家美国贷款机构倒闭。【原文：Almost 50 U.S. lenders could fail in the coming years under pressure from higher interest rates and operational problems, Nomura analyst Greg Hertrich told reporters at the company's New York office on Tuesday.】

item.title: 投资者等待美国通胀数据，"软着陆 "希望渺茫
item.description: 本周三，投资者对美国经济新出现的乐观情绪将面临重要考验，消费者物价数据将显示，推动近期股市上涨的软着陆希望是否合理。【原文：Investors’ newfound optimism on the U.S. economy faces an important test on Wednesday, with consumer price data set to show whether the soft landing hopes that have fueled recent gains in equities are justified.】

item.title: 解说：meme股票为何再次反弹？
item.description: GameStop 和 AMC Entertainment 再次吸引了散户投资者的眼球，这不禁让人联想起三年前华尔街的 "记忆股狂潮"，当时那股狂潮背后的领军人物 "咆哮的凯蒂猫 "在社交媒体上发布了一些帖子。【原文：GameStop and AMC Entertainment have again captured retail investors' attention, reminiscent of "the meme stock frenzy" that gripped Wall Street three years ago, following social media posts from the leading figure behind that rally "Roaring Kitty".】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，作为耐克节约成本计划的一部分，匡威将裁员
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引一份内部备忘录报道，鞋类品牌匡威将裁员，作为母公司耐克正在实施的 20 亿美元成本节约计划的一部分。【原文：Footwear brand Converse will cut jobs as part of parent company Nike's on-going $2 billion cost savings plan, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday citing an internal memo.】

item.title: 波音 "星际客机 "乘员首次亮相因飞船问题再次推迟
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，由于航天器推进系统出现问题，该公司首次搭载宇航员进入太空的 "星际客机"（Starliner）任务再次推迟，至少推迟到5月21日。【原文：Boeing's first Starliner mission carrying astronauts into space has been delayed again - until at least May 21 - over an issue with the spacecraft's propulsion system, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪在墨西哥推出中型混合动力皮卡车
item.description: 中国汽车制造商比亚迪周二在墨西哥发布了中型混合动力电动皮卡 "鲨鱼"（Shark）。【原文：Chinese automaker BYD unveiled the Shark, a mid-size hybrid-electric pickup truck, in Mexico on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 xAI 公司接近达成价值 100 亿美元的协议，租用甲骨文公司的人工智能服务器
item.description: 据《The Information》周二报道，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司 xAI 一直在与甲骨文公司的高管商谈，计划在数年内斥资 100 亿美元从甲骨文公司租用云服务器。【原文：Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI has been talking to executives from Oracle about spending $10 billion to rent cloud servers from the company over a period of years, The Information reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 通胀缓解，阿根廷交易员押注再次大幅降息
item.description: 两位货币市场消息人士和一家经纪公司周二告诉路透社，鉴于月度通胀放缓和计划中的国债拍卖，阿根廷市场交易商押注央行本周将再次下调基准利率。【原文：Argentine market traders are betting the central bank will cut its benchmark interest rate again this week given the slowdown in monthly inflation and a planned Treasury debt auction, two money market sources and a brokerage told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 乐购的千万富翁--首席执行官年薪翻番
item.description: 英国最大的超市集团乐购（Tesco）的老板在 2023/24 财年的薪酬翻了一番多，达到近 1,000 万英镑（1,260 万美元），而在此期间，数百万顾客正与生活成本危机作斗争。【原文：The boss of Tesco , Britain's largest supermarket group, saw his pay package more than double to almost 10 million pounds ($12.6 million) in its 2023/24 financial year, a period when millions of its customers battled a cost of living crisis.】

item.title: 康卡斯特将推出 Netflix、Apple TV+、Peacock 流媒体捆绑产品
item.description: 康卡斯特将推出一款流媒体捆绑服务，将其 Peacock 服务与 Netflix 和 Apple TV+ 结合在一起，这家媒体和宽带公司希望在激烈的竞争中留住用户。【原文：Comcast is set to launch a streaming bundle combining its Peacock service with Netflix and Apple TV+ , as the media and broadband company looks to retain subscribers in the face of stiff competition.】

item.title: 纽约联储：在债务水平不断攀升的情况下，一些借款人面临更大的压力
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周二发布的一份报告称，第一季度美国家庭总债务水平上升，因为本已压力重重的信用卡借款人面临着越来越多的挑战。【原文：Total U.S. household debt levels increased in the first quarter as already stressed credit card borrowers faced rising challenges, a report from the Federal Reserve Bank of New York said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 波音商用飞机四月交付量减少两架
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，该公司上个月交付了 24 架商用飞机，比去年同期的 26 架减少了两架。【原文：Boeing said on Tuesday it delivered 24 commercial airplanes last month, down by two from the 26 planes it handed over to customers during a weak April for deliveries a year ago, as the U.S. planemaker works to improve production of its 737 MAX.】

item.title: 美国联邦储备委员会主席鲍威尔预计通胀率将下降，但信心不如以往
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，他预计美国的通胀率将像去年一样在2024年前继续下降，不过在第一季度物价上涨速度超过预期之后，他对此的信心有所下降。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said he expects U.S. inflation to continue declining through 2024 as it did last year, though his confidence in that has fallen after prices rose more quickly than expected through the first quarter.】

item.title: 美国航空公司预测 2024 年夏季旅行人数将创历史新高，比 2023 年增长 6.3
item.description: 一个代表美国主要航空公司的组织预测，夏季旅行人数将创历史新高，预计将运送 2.71 亿人次，同比增长 6.3%。【原文：A group representing major U.S. airlines forecast record summer travel with carriers expected to transport 271 million passengers, up 6.3%.】

item.title: 美联储主席鲍威尔PPI "好坏参半"，下一步不太可能是加息
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周二表示，最新的美国生产者价格报告 "喜忧参半"，而非 "热火朝天"，因为即使4月份的数据高于预期，此前的数据也被下调了。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on Tuesday said the latest report on U.S. producer prices was more "mixed" than "hot" given that prior data was revised lower even as the figures for April came in higher than expected.】

item.title: 必和必拓总裁敦促盎格鲁投资者考虑收购利益
item.description: 必和必拓首席执行官迈克-亨利（Mike Henry）说，英美资源集团的投资者需要考虑必和必拓收购其在伦敦上市的较小竞争对手的利弊，他试图为这项已被拒绝两次的提议争取支持。【原文：BHP Chief Executive Mike Henry said that Anglo American investors need to consider the merits of his company's bid for its smaller London-listed rival, seeking to drum up support for a proposal that has been rejected twice.】

item.title: 特斯拉因加州工厂排放废气被起诉
item.description: 特斯拉被一家非营利性环保组织起诉，该组织指控埃隆-马斯克的电动汽车公司数百次违反联邦《清洁空气法》，让其位于加利福尼亚州弗里蒙特的工厂排放有害污染物。【原文：Tesla has been sued by an environmental nonprofit that accused Elon Musk's electric car company of violating the federal Clean Air Act hundreds of times by letting its Fremont, California, plant emit harmful pollutants.】

item.title: 亚马逊云计算部门首席执行官亚当-塞利普斯基将卸任，马特-加曼将接替其职位
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）云计算部门亚马逊网络服务公司（Amazon Web Services）首席执行官亚当-塞利普斯基（Adam Selipsky）周二表示，他即将卸任。【原文：The chief executive of Amazon.com's cloud unit Amazon Web Services, Adam Selipsky, is stepping down, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普称中美需要对其他车辆和产品征收关税
item.description: 美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普说，拜登政府对中国电动汽车、半导体和医疗产品征收的新关税应适用于其他类型的汽车和产品。【原文：Former U.S. President Donald Trump said the Biden administration's new tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles, semiconductors and medical products should be applied to other types of vehicles and products.】
